sentences: From the early 1980s to the late 1990s, Jones performed with the post-punk band Fifth Column, playing drums, guitar and background vocals, and was one of the co-founders of the group.
Jones' first gallery was Feature Inc. in New York, curated by Hudson, who was the first art dealer to showcase her Tom Girls series of drawings from 1991 to 1999.
Exhibitions of her work have been held at Los Angeles Contemporary Exhibitions, Mercer Union, Paul Petro Contemporary Art in Toronto, La Centrale in Montreal, and other galleries.
